.

.

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographical records: Syria .
General distribution: Syria .
Type : NHMW in the Brunner von Wattenwyl’s collection; Paratype in the former Zoological Institute, Leningard, now ZIN . Type locality: Syria

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ectobius neolividus
Fruhstorfer, 1921
: 13
, 18, 56, 58 , 63, 78 . Geographical records: Turkey .

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution: Switzerland ; Sicily, Italy ; Yugoslavia ; Romania ; Bulgaria ; Turkey ; Caucasus mountains. Type : Syntype ZMHB . Type locality: Switzerland .

(http://nmbe-xen 25 .unibe.ch/sites/default/files/uploads/pubinv/ 2120 .pdf) There are specimens identified as
vittiventris
in MHNG , but they are not indicated as types or as part of a type series.

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographical records: Syria , Turkey .

in Syria and Turkey in ZMHB .

Phyllodromica pallida
(Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1882 )
Aphlebia pallida Brunner
von Wattenwyl, 1882 : 42 . Geographical records: Turkey .
General distribution: Greece ; Yugoslavia ; Turkey . Type : NHMW . Type locality: Greece .
Ref: Princis 1971 : 1104 .

There are specimens identified as
pallida
in MHNG , but they are not indicated as types or as part of a type series.
